title: Smokie - Whose Are These Boots [1990] CD @ 320kbps VBR
description:
Smokie - Whose Are These Boots [1990] CD @ 320kbps VBR

01. In The Middle Of A Lonely Dream
02. Heartbreak Angel
03. I Feel Love
04. Romeo And Juliet
05. Every Little Kiss
06. Fistful Of Dollars
07. This Side Of Paradise
08. Hurting
09. Never Made In Heaven
10. Heat Of The Night

This is the overall best Smokie album made by the line-up featuring ALAN BARTON on lead vocals in my opinion. In fact the man himself wrote what I consider to be the album's highpoint, the track Fistful Of Dollars.

The direction is probably more AOR than usual for the band and the last track Heat Of The Night has a riff borrowed directly from American rockers Starz. Ever heard So Young So Bad on Coliseum Rock?

While probably the most difficult to obtain Smokie album, the strange title given apparently refers to the exotic choice of footwear worn by lead guitarist Alan Silson.

Take a listen!
